title: Crispy Waffles
tagline: Crispy outside, fluffy inside. The cornstarch is the secret.
description: Crispy outside, fluffy inside. The cornstarch is the secret.
steps: Whisk flour, cornstarch, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
In another bowl, whisk egg yolks, milk, oil, and vanilla.
Beat egg whites to stiff peaks.
Pour wet into dry, stir until just combined.
Fold in egg whites gently—lumps are okay.
Cook according to your waffle iron instructions.
notes: Cornstarch = crispy: It's the secret to that crunch.
Whipped whites = fluffy: Don't skip this step.
Don't stack: Keep waffles on a wire rack in warm oven to stay crispy.
